title: T206 Hindu Southern League Want List

posts.post_title: T206 Hindu Southern League Want List
posts.post_content:
I'm now halfway done with my T206 Hindu SL subset - many thanks to those on this board who've helped me get this far. 

Below are the cards I still need. If anyone has any available, please let me know. Condition doesn't matter to me.

Carey, Scoops
Ellam, Roy
Foster, Ed
Guiheen, Tom
Howard, Ernie
Jordan, Dutch
Lafitte, James
Lipe, Perry
Manion, George
McCauley, Pat
Reagan, Ed
Shaughnessy, Shag
Thornton, Woodie
Violat, Juan

PM or email me:  [url]email.jasonstricker@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks!
Jason

Jason...

McCauley is on ebay.. Hooker and Howard are in Goodwin.

Best of Luck

Jamie
Jamie- there goes my chances of getting those cards on the cheap now. ;)

[quote name="Blunder19" post=1071574]McCauley is on ebay.. Hooker and Howard are in Goodwin.[/QUOTE]

Yup, I'm watching them, thanks. McCauley however has gotten up there in price and has some strange bid amounts (similar to what was discussed in the probstein thread), so I'll probably avoid that one.

Here are two...maybe a little rough.

Mac
Picked up Ryan and Hooker. Still looking for the others. Any help would be appreciated, thanks!
here are a few we will have in our next auction..starting 2/25/13  thru  3/9/13.
